attributes.action: strip Sir George Mathewson of his knighthood for causing the downfall of the RBS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir George Mathewson should be stripped of his knighthood for his part in the downfall of the RBS banking group. The reason for gaining his knighthood was for creating the expanded RBS group which is now in total disarray due to his actions namely buying the ABN AMRO bank.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Honours Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
